DEVICE_TYPE_00.SYSTEM: # (ON) enable or disable USB HID data transfer protocol # (OFF) enable or disable USB CDC virtual serial port data transfer protocol # (ON) enable or disable USB Video Class (UVC) video transfer protocol # Use "COORDINATE_RAW" or "COORDINATE_CALIBRATED" for automatic data streaming of raw or calibrated data. Use "COORDINATE_NONE" to disable

LIVETRACK_CONFIG:
# Tracked ellipse overlay on pupil and glints # (62) 0 - 63, OFF=0, ON=62, UVC slider "BackLight Comp" can also set this parameter
# Default horizontal offset of the analysed eye image (LiveTrack AP model only) # UVC slider "Zoom" can also set this the parameter
# Enable tracking left eye by default (LiveTrack FM and AP models only) # UVC slider "Focus" can also set this parameter
# Enable tracking right eye by default (LiveTrack FM and AP models only) # UVC slider "Focus" can also set this parameter
# Default contents of the calibration matrices. # Replace the following when a calibration has been performed.
